name: Through a Dungeon Darkly
description:
This is a randomly-generated dungeon exploring game where the goal is to get to the end of each floor as quickly as possible. The light in each floor dies out over time and the enemies only get faster as you take longer.

As this was a hastily-made game jam submission, there are only three levels available, almost no features, and entirely no polish. However, if you do enjoy it anyway, I would love for you to stop by in the comments section. :D
